,,, 4.5 to 6GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5506;MSC, 5506, 513CL;1;InGaP/GaAs HBT;16-pin MLPQ; |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=001601XXXXXX_A, 001601XXXXXX_G |default_ssid_regex=^001601[A-F0-9]{6}_A$,,, ^001601[A-F0-9]{6}_G$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:16:01 |oui_eth=00:16:01 |default_ch= }} [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/WHR-HP-AG108 On the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:buffalo:whr_hp_ag108 On the OpenWrt wiki] {{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WHR-HP-AG108}} "RT403W-D91 REV2.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The firmware version flashed at the factory is 1.34. The 802.11g radio's MAC address is 1 greater than that of the MAC used by the 802.11a radio. The WAN+LAN ports and the 802.11a radio use the same MAC address. The power adapter included with the device is a '''UNIFIVE CO., LTD.''' AM-US100523 (5V, 2.3A).
